Name: New York Rat Simulator
About the game: What takes place in this Rat Simulation? In a world bound by the very laws of traffic, one Rat has been chosen to harass them all. Engage in a simulation as said Rat, to roam the streets of New York, imbued with unnatural jumping abilities, you can now disrupt the very fabric of society and collect pizza slices in the name of the glorious Rat King to summon the dark eldritch being of New York...
